SchemaItem.Name: DocumentDelivery_Dimensions
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<!-- include Dimensions_Lookup !--> <xsl:include href="model://ac0dc9ff-9fcc-4a9e-b810-d811d3c19699"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document/DocumentDelivery"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
<xsl:call-template name="SetDimensions"> <xsl:with-param name="entityId"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentDelivery_PurchaseBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentDelivery_SalesBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentDelivery_PurchaseContract')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentDelivery_SalesContract')"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> <!-- <xsl:with-param name="projectId"><xsl:value-of select="@refProjectId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="siteId"><xsl:value-of select="@refSiteId"/></xsl:with-param> !--> <xsl:with-param name="businessPartnerId"><xsl:value-of select="@refBusinessPartnerId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="warehouseId"><xsl:value-of select="@refWarehouseId"/></xsl:with-param> <!-- <xsl:with-param name="productId"></xsl:with-param> !--> </xsl:call-template>
<xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: BR_Contract_NoApproval_Purchase
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and (/row/@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and /row/@PriceLocalTotalPayable < AS:GetConstant('Document_PurchaseApprovalPriceLimit'))

SchemaItem.Name: ER_Document_CanOrder
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Document"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
<xsl:if test="not(AS:LookupValue('867c253a-4d32-4e85-96c5-bb9faec97933', @refProjectId) = AS:GetConstant('ProjectDeliveryState_Running'))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="''"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="''"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentCannotOrder_ProjectNotRunning', @ReferenceCode)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: SR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldGenerateRequisition
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('7c36bb98-5dbf-4b5b-97e6-c5aff7b6b97f', /row/@refWarehouseId) ='true' and AS:LookupValue('1282374c-77e9-4880-906e-fa9b2f83add5', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and (AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Invoice') or AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma'))

SchemaItem.Name: BR_DocumentDelivery_CanBill
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDeliveryStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_Canceled')

SchemaItem.Name: BR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldDisable_SalesOrder_AfterOrderAccepted
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('1282374c-77e9-4880-906e-fa9b2f83add5', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and AS:IsInState('93ae7473-8c41-48fa-b808-821f85084a2b', 'c93bf65f-9108-4dbd-8be0-ee3ca505734b', AS:LookupValue('22b6c737-e7b2-48ef-a5d7-da143a013d5b', /row/@refDocumentId) , '7f81060a-9262-42e0-931d-97984615bb31')

SchemaItem.Name: BR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldDisable
SchemaItem.M01: AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_ShouldDisableAfterDeliveryStarted') = 'true' and /row/@refDocumentDeliveryStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_NotDelivered') and /row/@refDocumentDeliveryStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_ReadyForReceiving')

SchemaItem.Name: SR_BonusPoints_AccountDoesNotExist
SchemaItem.M01: not(string(AS:LookupValue('fc184895-e6a0-469a-a9ec-46a466fbe803', /ROOT/value)))

SchemaItem.Name: SR_DeliveryDirectionId_Purchase
SchemaItem.M01: /ROOT/value = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')

SchemaItem.Name: ER_DocumentBillingDetail_OverrideExpirationDate
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/> <xsl:include href="model://4beeaf13-b585-479d-aca5-deeddcfcbd18"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document/DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail"/> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentBillingDetail"> <xsl:variable name="bestBeforeDays" select="AS:LookupValue('616af6ef-9848-4247-b040-25d41b325e37',@refProductId)" /> <xsl:if test="string($bestBeforeDays)"> <xsl:call-template name="ExpirationDateValidation"> <xsl:with-param name="referenceCode" select="../../@ReferenceCode"/> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="@InfoText1" /> <xsl:with-param name="plneni" select="../@Text"/> <xsl:with-param name="overrideExpDate" select="@OverrideExpirationDate"/> <xsl:with-param name="agreedDelivery" select="../@DateAgreed" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: ER_DocumentBillingDetail_ExpirationDateTemplate
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template name="ExpirationDateValidation"> <xsl:param name="referenceCode" /> <xsl:param name="text" /> <xsl:param name="plneni" /> <xsl:param name="overrideExpDate" /> <xsl:param name="agreedDelivery" />
<xsl:if test="string($overrideExpDate) and AS:DifferenceInDays($agreedDelivery, $overrideExpDate) < 0 "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'OverrideExpirationDate'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentBillingDetail_OverrideExprirationDate', AS:FormatDate($overrideExpDate, 'dd.MM.yyyy'), AS:FormatDate($agreedDelivery, 'dd.MM.yyyy'), $text, $referenceCode, $plneni )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: SR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldGenerateReturnOutbound
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('41c797b3-4df3-4708-b8cb-5350756d1e60', /row/@refWarehouseId) ='true' and AS:LookupValue('1282374c-77e9-4880-906e-fa9b2f83add5', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and not((AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Invoice') or AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma')))

SchemaItem.Name: DocumentDelivery_refBusinessPartnerId
SchemaItem.M01: AS:iif(AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_AddressRequired') = AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_High') and not(string(@refBusinessPartnerId)), ../@refBusinessPartnerId, @refBusinessPartnerId)

SchemaItem.Name: SR_BusinessPartnerRole_IsCustomer
SchemaItem.M01: /ROOT/value = AS:GetConstant('BusinessPartnerRoleType_Customer')

SchemaItem.Name: BR_CanGenerateDeliveryOutbound
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('d1075ad0-8004-4d31-9c93-07f0d87bc5c5', /ROOT/value) = 'true'

SchemaItem.Name: SR_IsProjectPlanned
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('867c253a-4d32-4e85-96c5-bb9faec97933', /ROOT/value) = AS:GetConstant('ProjectDeliveryState_Planned')

SchemaItem.Name: ER_SD_AddBonusPoints
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:apply-templates select="SD"/> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="SD"> <xsl:if test="not(@i1 > 0)"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'i1'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'SD'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_BonusPoints_ErrorEnterPoints')"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="not(string(@s1))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'s1'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'SD'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_BonusPoints_ErrorEnterText')"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: SR_BonusPoints_NonZero
SchemaItem.M01: /ROOT/value != 0

SchemaItem.Name: SR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldGenerateReceipt
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('cecaf216-75a5-4bc0-b12a-9deb0e2f41ca', /row/@refWarehouseId) ='true' and AS:LookupValue('1282374c-77e9-4880-906e-fa9b2f83add5', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and (AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Invoice') or AS:LookupValue('e613b0e1-60a6-4d5e-b970-20d401c63725', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma'))

SchemaItem.Name: BR_Contract_MustApprove_Purchase
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and /row/@PriceLocalTotalPayable >= AS:GetConstant('Document_PurchaseApprovalPriceLimit')

SchemaItem.Name: BR_DocumentBillingDetail_ShouldDisable
SchemaItem.M01: AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_ShouldDisableAfterDeliveryStarted') = 'true' and AS:LookupValue('c2ff5cdd-51ef-4f26-9801-f684f6667fe3', /row/@refDocumentDeliveryId) != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_NotDelivered') and AS:LookupValue('c2ff5cdd-51ef-4f26-9801-f684f6667fe3', /row/@refDocumentDeliveryId) != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_ReadyForReceiving') and string(AS:LookupValue('c2ff5cdd-51ef-4f26-9801-f684f6667fe3', /row/@refDocumentDeliveryId))

SchemaItem.Name: BR_CanSetBillingState2
SchemaItem.M01: /ROOT/DocumentDelivery/@refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_Invoiced') and /ROOT/DocumentDelivery/@refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_None')

SchemaItem.Name: SR_PaymentAccountType_Cash
SchemaItem.M01: /ROOT/value = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_Cash')

SchemaItem.Name: ER_Payment
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Payment"/> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Payment"> <xsl:variable name="accountGeneralTypeId" select="AS:LookupValue('8fc3e879-8263-4bec-9073-03759bdd11ac', @refPaymentAccountId)"/> <xsl:if test="not(string(Text)) and $accountGeneralTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountGeneralType_Cash')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'Text'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Payment'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_PaymentTextNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: BR_DocumentDelivery_BillingType_None
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_None')

<xsl:if test="AS:IsFeatureOn($feature4)"> <xsl:variable name="source" select="AS:LookupValue('2d28a5af-257c-4c3d-aa41-324be9caccc2', $entityId)"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Project')"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('69c3939f-0e2d-49d8-b92b-fd05b9787c13', $projectId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Site')"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('f13b2320-d615-4d70-abcf-8d036128007e', $siteId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_BusinessPartner') and string($businessPartnerId)"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('bb8722a3-30d0-443e-9b29-4f9ad659433c', $businessPartnerId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_BusinessPartnerRole') and string($businessPartnerId) and string($businessPartnerRoleTypeId)"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('1b33c007-31ac-4ddb-bc66-49b48c0946c1', 'BusinessPartnerRole_parBusinessPartnerId', $businessPartnerId, 'BusinessPartnerRole_parBusinessPartnerRoleTypeId', $businessPartnerRoleTypeId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Warehouse') and string($warehouseId)"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('8a3c9180-b2e5-4ac0-a724-bf86dc224d14', $warehouseId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$source = AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Product') and string($productId)"> <xsl:attribute name="refDimension4Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('5bbed89b-ca37-4cba-adcb-ec1592d1cab0', $productId)"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: BR_CanSetBillingState1
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('1282374c-77e9-4880-906e-fa9b2f83add5', string(/ROOT/value)) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')

SchemaItem.Name: SR_DocumentDelivery_ShouldCreateDefaultLogisticsRouteSchedule2

SchemaItem.Name: DocumentBillingDetail_Dimensions
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<!-- include Dimensions_Lookup !--> <xsl:include href="model://ac0dc9ff-9fcc-4a9e-b810-d811d3c19699"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document/DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentBillingDetail"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
<xsl:call-template name="SetDimensions"> <xsl:with-param name="entityId"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and ../../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentBillingDetail_PurchaseBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and ../../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentBillingDetail_SalesBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and ../../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentBillingDetail_PurchaseContract')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and ../../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_DocumentBillingDetail_SalesContract')"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> <!-- <xsl:with-param name="projectId"><xsl:value-of select="@refProjectId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="businessPartnerId"><xsl:value-of select="@refBusinessPartnerId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="warehouseId"><xsl:value-of select="@refWarehouseId"/></xsl:with-param> !--> <xsl:with-param name="siteId"><xsl:value-of select="@refContractSiteId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="productId"><xsl:value-of select="@refProductId"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template>
<xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: SR_ShouldGenerateInventoryOperationsFromBills
SchemaItem.M01: AS:LookupValue('b0dfadb4-8dbc-4979-8a8d-11d2f80ea626', /row/@refDocumentId) = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and string(AS:LookupValue('d1934dbb-c21f-4f82-b080-12bd4b47ac39', /row/@refWarehouseId))

SchemaItem.Name: Document_ShouldDisable_PurchaseOrder_AfterOrdered
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and AS:IsInState('93ae7473-8c41-48fa-b808-821f85084a2b', 'c93bf65f-9108-4dbd-8be0-ee3ca505734b', string(/row/@refDocumentContractStateId), '3f665d27-e6ca-46f0-92cc-5d158a89a6d9')

SchemaItem.Name: Document_ShouldDisable_SalesOrder_AfterOrderAccepted
SchemaItem.M01: /row/@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and AS:IsInState('93ae7473-8c41-48fa-b808-821f85084a2b', 'c93bf65f-9108-4dbd-8be0-ee3ca505734b', string(/row/@refDocumentContractStateId), '7f81060a-9262-42e0-931d-97984615bb31')

SchemaItem.Name: ER_Document_Valid
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/> <xsl:include href="model://16eb7a42-af3f-4773-bd3c-329069c03551"/> <xsl:include href="model://4beeaf13-b585-479d-aca5-deeddcfcbd18"/>
<xsl:key name="warehouseItems" match="/ROOT/Document/DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail[string(@refProductId)]" use="concat(../@refWarehouseId, @refProductId)" /> <xsl:key name="productsCustomer" match="/ROOT/Document/DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail[string(@refProductId)]" use="concat(../../@refBusinessPartnerId, AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId))" /> <xsl:key name="productsEndConsumer" match="/ROOT/Document/DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail[string(@refProductId)]" use="concat(AS:isnull(../@refBusinessPartnerId, ../../@refBusinessPartnerId), AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId))" />
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document"/> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Document"> <xsl:variable name="PartnerLocationId" select="AS:LookupValue('4295c690-7948-4ada-968d-0dab9bd8aec1', @refBusinessPartnerId)"/> <xsl:variable name="distributeAllProducts" select="AS:LookupValue('1a44dcfa-6267-4a92-9983-edbe1792a809', @refSiteId)"/>
<xsl:variable name="taxProfileId" select="AS:LookupValue('14ee4aa3-9d01-4381-a851-edf1d2a1c615', @refBusinessPartnerId)"/>
<!-- inactive tax profile --> <xsl:if test="AS:LookupValue('f35f6d69-2ed3-460e-bbf3-f6166fbfe0df', $taxProfileId) = 'false'"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refTaxProfileId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_InactiveTaxProfile_Document', AS:LookupValue('832582bc-10b5-4a4a-80de-5f117df81423', $taxProfileId), @ReferenceCode )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check if accounting period is not closed for bills, for contracts it will be checked on document-delivery level --> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:call-template name="CheckAccountingPeriod"> <xsl:with-param name="date" select="AS:isnull(@DateVAT, @DateIssued)"/> <xsl:with-param name="agendaName" select="AS:LookupValue('f7921151-e90f-4380-84b0-0dda5cdcbd23', @refDocumentTypeId)"/> <xsl:with-param name="referenceCode" select="@ReferenceCode"/> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="not(string($PartnerLocationId)) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refBusinessPartnerId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_CannotGetDocumentNumber', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="not(string(@DateVAT)) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_ProformaCancellation')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'DateVAT'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentVatDateNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference mandatory - sales order --> <xsl:if test="not(string(@PartnerReferenceCode)) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and AS:IsFeatureOn('COMMERCE_SALESORDER_PARTNERREFERENCECODE_MANDATORY') "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentPartnerReferenceCodeNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference mandatory - purchase order --> <xsl:if test="not(string(@PartnerReferenceCode)) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') and AS:IsFeatureOn('COMMERCE_PURCHORDER_PARTNERREFERENCECODE_MANDATORY') "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentPartnerReferenceCodeNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference (always mandatory) - purchase bill --> <xsl:if test="not(string(@PartnerReferenceCode)) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentPartnerReferenceCodeNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference duplicate - sales contract --> <xsl:if test="string(@PartnerReferenceCode) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') "> <xsl:variable name="duplicateRef" select="AS:LookupValue('081f30e1-fa86-4bc9-af50-03bd65d0242c', 'Document_parPartnerReferenceCode', @PartnerReferenceCode, 'Document_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'Document_parId', @Id)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($duplicateRef)"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_SalesContractDuplicate', @PartnerReferenceCode, $duplicateRef, AS:LookupValue('f1b27549-5338-4d99-a5d1-98e4d1bc5140', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference duplicate - purchase bill --> <xsl:if test="string(@PartnerReferenceCode) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase') "> <xsl:variable name="duplicateRef" select="AS:LookupValue('8162381d-5822-4596-8970-98ad3686aca4', 'Document_parPartnerReferenceCode', @PartnerReferenceCode, 'Document_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'Document_parId', @Id)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($duplicateRef)"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_PurchaseBillDuplicate', @PartnerReferenceCode, $duplicateRef, AS:LookupValue('f1b27549-5338-4d99-a5d1-98e4d1bc5140', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- check partner reference duplicate - sales bill --> <xsl:if test="string(@PartnerReferenceCode) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') "> <xsl:variable name="duplicateRef" select="AS:LookupValue('1f9dbead-4d35-4e5b-9854-962258885959', 'Document_parPartnerReferenceCode', @PartnerReferenceCode, 'Document_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'Document_parId', @Id)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($duplicateRef)"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'PartnerReferenceCode'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'Document'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_SalesBillDuplicate', @PartnerReferenceCode, $duplicateRef, AS:LookupValue('f1b27549-5338-4d99-a5d1-98e4d1bc5140', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="not(string(@refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId)) and AS:GetConstant('Document_AddressRequired') != AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_None')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentBillingAddressNotSet', @ReferenceCode)"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="AS:GetConstant('Document_AddressRequired') = AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_Low')"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="AS:GetConstant('Document_AddressRequired') = AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_High')"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check available quantity grouped by warehouse and product on sales order <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and AS:GetConstant('LogisticsShipping_IsWarehouseRequisitionCreated') = 'true'"> <xsl:for-each select="DocumentDelivery[@refDocumentDeliveryTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_DeliveryNote')]/DocumentBillingDetail[generate-id(.)=generate-id(key('warehouseItems', concat(../@refWarehouseId, @refProductId))[1])]"> <xsl:if test="string(../@refWarehouseId) and string(@refProductId)"> <xsl:variable name="requestedQty" select="AS:sum(key('warehouseItems', concat(../@refWarehouseId, @refProductId))/@Quantity)"/> <xsl:variable name="availableQty" select="AS:LookupValue('e2b4f4ca-0d55-4521-b6dd-55fe139a046b', 'InventoryAvailability_parWarehouseId', ../@refWarehouseId, 'InventoryAvailability_parProductId', @refProductId)"/>
<xsl:if test="$availableQty < $requestedQty"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'Quantity'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="concat('Na sklad ', AS:LookupValue('c3b2bee0-b487-47f2-a2bb-dad170c3a6c1', ../@refWarehouseId), ' nen dostaten mnostv produktu ', AS:LookupValue('2ca0c125-060d-4c64-9f25-80d5469fb093', @refProductId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if> !-->
<!-- check product limit - customers !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:for-each select="DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail[string(@refProductId) and generate-id(.)=generate-id(key('productsCustomer', concat(../../@refBusinessPartnerId, AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId)))[1])]"> <xsl:variable name="limitGroupId" select="AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId)"/> <xsl:if test="string($limitGroupId)"> <xsl:variable name="requestedQty" select="AS:sum(key('productsCustomer', concat(../../@refBusinessPartnerId, $limitGroupId))/@Quantity)"/> <xsl:variable name="limitId" select="AS:LookupValue('862da701-553e-4235-8422-39958b227d53', 'BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parBusinessPartnerId', ../../@refBusinessPartnerId, 'BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parProductLimitGroupId', $limitGroupId, 'BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parDate', ../../@DateIssued)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($limitId)"> <xsl:variable name="dateFrom" select="AS:LookupValue('0d0ff8b8-de33-48b4-8aa4-efa6339af645', $limitId)"/> <xsl:variable name="dateTo" select="AS:LookupValue('de6b1ea2-7a36-47ca-98c3-346981856252', $limitId)"/> <xsl:variable name="limit" select="AS:LookupValue('4d0c2c76-df53-4f63-9ff6-211f786dc8f7', $limitId)"/>
<xsl:variable name="customerLimitConsumedParams"> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDocumentId" value="{../../@Id}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parBusinessPartnerId" value="{../../@refBusinessPartnerId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parProductLimitGroupId" value="{$limitGroupId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDateFrom" value="{$dateFrom}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDateTo" value="{$dateTo}"/> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="customerLimitConsumed" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValueEx('de71dda4-17ab-4bf5-9c17-2f7d92aa1361', $customerLimitConsumedParams), 0)"/>
<xsl:if test="$requestedQty + $customerLimitConsumed > $limit"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'Quantity'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_BusinessPartnerProductLimitExceeded', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', ../../@refBusinessPartnerId), AS:LookupValue('d49ebc11-66a5-4667-9b20-11987380fd08', $limitGroupId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if>
<!-- check product limit - end consumers !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:for-each select="DocumentDelivery/DocumentBillingDetail[string(@refProductId) and generate-id(.)=generate-id(key('productsEndConsumer', concat(AS:isnull(../@refBusinessPartnerId, ../../@refBusinessPartnerId), AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId)))[1])]"> <xsl:variable name="limitGroupId" select="AS:LookupValue('1693882d-8926-4971-bef8-45d41eed5095', @refProductId)"/> <xsl:if test="string($limitGroupId)"> <xsl:variable name="endConsumerId" select="AS:isnull(../@refBusinessPartnerId, ../../@refBusinessPartnerId)"/> <xsl:variable name="requestedQty" select="AS:sum(key('productsEndConsumer', concat($endConsumerId, $limitGroupId))/@Quantity)"/> <xsl:variable name="limitIdParams"> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parBusinessPartnerId" value="{../../@refBusinessPartnerId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parProductLimitGroupId" value="{$limitGroupId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parDate" value="{../../@DateIssued}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimit_parEndConsumerBusinessPartnerId" value="{$endConsumerId}"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="limitId" select="AS:LookupValueEx('f97a6ccf-745d-4df8-a2bd-94891c3f18ff', $limitIdParams)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($limitId)"> <xsl:variable name="dateFrom" select="AS:LookupValue('0d0ff8b8-de33-48b4-8aa4-efa6339af645', $limitId)"/> <xsl:variable name="dateTo" select="AS:LookupValue('de6b1ea2-7a36-47ca-98c3-346981856252', $limitId)"/> <xsl:variable name="limit" select="AS:LookupValue('4d0c2c76-df53-4f63-9ff6-211f786dc8f7', $limitId)"/>
<xsl:variable name="customerLimitConsumedParams"> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDocumentId" value="{../../@Id}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parBusinessPartnerId" value="{../../@refBusinessPartnerId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parProductLimitGroupId" value="{$limitGroupId}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDateFrom" value="{$dateFrom}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parDateTo" value="{$dateTo}"/> <parameter key="BusinessPartnerProductLimitConsumption_parEndConsumerBusinessPartnerId" value="{$endConsumerId}"/> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="customerLimitConsumed" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValueEx('fb22e47e-2589-426a-9630-501dbc4a5863', $customerLimitConsumedParams), 0)"/>
<xsl:if test="$requestedQty + $customerLimitConsumed > $limit"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'Quantity'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_RecipientProductLimitExceeded', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', $endConsumerId), AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', ../../@refBusinessPartnerId), AS:LookupValue('d49ebc11-66a5-4667-9b20-11987380fd08', $limitGroupId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if>
<xsl:variable name="creditProfileId" select="AS:LookupValue('2592aae4-f1d8-41e1-867b-92da627929e6', 'BusinessPartnerCreditProfile_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'BusinessPartnerCreditProfile_parCurrencyId', AS:GetConstant('LocalCurrencyId'))"/> <xsl:variable name="creditCheckTypeId"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string($creditProfileId)"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('de991b4a-db36-430b-bf16-dbf23728c3f2', $creditProfileId)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DefaultBusinessPartnerCreditCheckType')"/></xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="checkCredit" select=" ( @refDocumentCreditStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentCreditState_Disapproved') or @refDocumentCreditStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentCreditState_CheckCredit') ) and $creditCheckTypeId = AS:GetConstant('BusinessPartnerCreditCheckType_Ordering') "/>
<!-- check credit approval !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentContractStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentContractState_OrderAccepted') and @refDocumentCreditStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentCreditState_WaitsForApproval')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'refDocumentCreditStateId'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentCreditNotApproved', @ReferenceCode)"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check credit limit - bill !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_ProformaCancellation') and (@refPaymentAccountTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_Bank') or @refPaymentAccountTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_DirectDebit')) and $checkCredit = 'true' ">
<xsl:variable name="limit" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValue('46dac952-871e-4621-9ae8-d7de10ac160c', @refBusinessPartnerId), AS:iif(AS:IsFeatureOn('COMMERCE_CREDIT_PROFILE_MANDATORY'), 0, ''))"/>
<xsl:if test="string($limit)"> <xsl:variable name="credit" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValue('29edda10-4f49-4c2e-b739-d3154d1cf23c', 'BusinessPartnerCredit_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'BusinessPartnerCredit_parDocument_Id', @Id), 0)"/>
<xsl:if test="$credit + @PriceLocalTotalPayable > $limit"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'PriceLocalTotalPayable'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_BusinessPartnerCreditLimitExceeded', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- check credit limit - contract !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and $checkCredit = 'true' ">
<xsl:variable name="limit" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValue('46dac952-871e-4621-9ae8-d7de10ac160c', @refBusinessPartnerId), AS:iif(AS:IsFeatureOn('COMMERCE_CREDIT_PROFILE_MANDATORY'), 0, ''))"/>
<xsl:if test="string($limit)"> <xsl:variable name="credit" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValue('29edda10-4f49-4c2e-b739-d3154d1cf23c', 'BusinessPartnerCredit_parBusinessPartnerId', @refBusinessPartnerId, 'BusinessPartnerCredit_parDocument_Id', @Id), 0)"/> <xsl:variable name="newCredit" select="AS:sum(DocumentDelivery[@refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_None') and (@refPaymentAccountTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_Bank') or @refPaymentAccountTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_DirectDebit'))]/@PriceLocalTotalPayable)"/>
<xsl:if test="$credit + $newCredit > $limit"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'PriceLocalTotalPayable'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_BusinessPartnerCreditLimitExceeded', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- check bonus points account for orders (they can be paid with bonus points) !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and (@BonusPointPriceTotal - @BonusPointPaid) != 0 and @refDocumentContractStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentContractState_Canceled') ">
<xsl:variable name="bonusPointAccountId" select="AS:LookupValue('fc184895-e6a0-469a-a9ec-46a466fbe803', @refBusinessPartnerId)"/>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string($bonusPointAccountId)"> <xsl:variable name="bonusPointBalance" select="AS:LookupValue('5599ff28-29eb-4820-8146-8bc940482600', 'PaymentAccountBalance_parId', $bonusPointAccountId, 'PaymentAccountBalance_parDate', date:date-time())"/>
<xsl:if test="not(string($bonusPointBalance) and $bonusPointBalance >= (@BonusPointPriceTotal - @BonusPointPaid))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'BonusPointPriceTotal'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_CustomerNotEnoughBonusPoints', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'BonusPointPriceTotal'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_CustomerNotEnoughBonusPoints', AS:LookupValue('08d82ef5-df38-48d6-a276-ee5b7f027bd6', @refBusinessPartnerId))"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if>
<xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:with-param name="distributeAllProducts" select="$distributeAllProducts"/> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:param name="distributeAllProducts"/>
<xsl:if test="../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract')"> <xsl:call-template name="CheckAccountingPeriod"> <xsl:with-param name="date" select="AS:isnull(AS:isnull(@DateStarted, @DateAgreed), ../@DateIssued)"/> <xsl:with-param name="agendaName" select="AS:LookupValue('f7921151-e90f-4380-84b0-0dda5cdcbd23', ../@refDocumentTypeId)"/> <xsl:with-param name="referenceCode" select="concat(../@ReferenceCode, ', ', @Text)"/> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- delivery address mandatory !--> <xsl:if test="not(string(@refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId)) and AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_AddressRequired') != AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_None')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" select="'refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId'"/> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName" select="'Document'"/> <xsl:with-param name="Message" select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDeliveryAddressNotSet', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_AddressRequired') = AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_Low')"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDelivery_AddressRequired') = AS:GetConstant('AsapExceptionSeverity_High')"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- items mandatory !--> <xsl:if test="count(DocumentBillingDetail) = 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="''"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentHasNoPriceLines', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- delivery date cannot get before order date, unless allowed by a role !--> <xsl:if test="string(@DateAgreed) and AS:DifferenceInMinutes(../@DateIssued, @DateAgreed) < 0 and AS:IsInRole('FUNC_Commerce_AllowDeliveryDateBeforeOrderDate')=false"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DateAgreed'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_ErrorDeliveryDateBeforeIssueDate', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- Billing Approval --> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_BillingApproved')"> <xsl:if test="not(string(@DateDelivered)) and @refDocumentDeliveryTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_None') and @refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_Proforma') and @refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_ProformaOnly') "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DateDelivered'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DateDeliveredNotSetCannotBill', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="@PriceLocalTotal = 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'PriceLocalTotal'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDeliveryZeroWarning', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- DELIVERY NOTE !--> <xsl:if test="@refDocumentDeliveryTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_DeliveryNote')">
<!-- delivery date mandatory !--> <xsl:if test="not(string(@DateAgreed))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DateAgreed'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDateAgreedNotSet', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!--DatePlanned must be lower or equal than DateAgreed--> <xsl:if test="string(@DatePlanned) and string(@DateAgreed)"> <xsl:variable name="diffDateDelivery" select="AS:DifferenceInDays(@DatePlanned, @DateAgreed)" /> <xsl:if test="$diffDateDelivery < 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DatePlanned'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDelivery_ErrorPlannedDate', AS:FormatDate(@DatePlanned, 'dd.MM.yyy'), AS:FormatDate(@DateAgreed, 'dd.MM.yyyy'))"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> <!-- transportation type mandatory !--> <xsl:if test="not(string(@refDocumentTransportationTypeId))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentTransportationTypeId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentTransportationNotSet', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- warehouse mandatory !--> <xsl:if test="not(string(@refWarehouseId))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refWarehouseId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentWarehouseNotSet', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- warn if route schedule date different from the planned date !--> <xsl:if test="string(@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId) and string(@DatePlanned)"> <xsl:if test="AS:DifferenceInDays(AS:LookupValue('73789807-6d49-4717-aff2-78a7224c2ded', @refLogisticsRouteScheduleId), @DatePlanned) != 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refLogisticsRouteScheduleId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDatePlannedDifferentFromScheduleWarning', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="string(@refDocumentTransportationTypeId)"> <xsl:if test="AS:LookupValue('aca5ccaa-cd08-408b-b565-350ed18ab874', @refDocumentTransportationTypeId) != AS:GetConstant('LogisticsRouteScheduleType_None')"> <!-- shipping route schedule warning - if logistics module used !--> <xsl:if test=" ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and @refDocumentDeliveryTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_DeliveryNote') and not(string(@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId)) "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refLogisticsRouteScheduleId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentShippingScheduleNotSet', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:variable name="finalAddressId" select="AS:iif(string(@refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId), string(@refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId), string(../@refBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId))"/>
<!-- shipping route not assigned warning - partner's address is not assigned to any route !--> <xsl:if test="string($finalAddressId)"> <xsl:if test=" ../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') and @refDocumentDeliveryTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_DeliveryNote') and not(string(@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId)) and string(AS:LookupValue('bc1e26ed-c2c5-44e9-88d0-b20bcc2d3eb0', 'LogisticsRouteUnloadingPoint_ListNotAssigned_parBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId', $finalAddressId, 'LogisticsRouteUnloadingPoint_ListNotAssigned_parDocumentTransportationTypeId', @refDocumentTransportationTypeId)) "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refLogisticsRouteScheduleId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDeliveryAddressNotAssignedToRoute', AS:LookupValue('aed12521-5cee-490c-ada4-bbeffde0a224', @refDocumentTransportationTypeId), ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- if route has a calendar, we check if the date is included in the working days !--> <xsl:variable name="routeId"> <xsl:if test="string($finalAddressId) and string(@refWarehouseId)"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('87215ba2-8529-4e9a-b0cf-3d981608bec4', 'LogisticsRoute_parWarehouseId', @refWarehouseId, 'LogisticsRouteUnloadingPoint_parBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId', $finalAddressId, 'LogisticsRoute_parDocumentTransportationTypeId', @refDocumentTransportationTypeId)"/> </xsl:if> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:if test="string($routeId) and string(@DatePlanned)"> <xsl:variable name="calendarId" select="AS:LookupValue('5545af0d-c429-4890-89ce-dc995db1831f', $routeId)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($calendarId)"> <xsl:variable name="nextWorkingDay" select="AS:AddWorkingDays(@DatePlanned, 0, $calendarId)"/>
<xsl:if test="AS:DifferenceInDays(@DatePlanned, $nextWorkingDay) != 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DateAgreed'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentInvalidShippingDate', AS:FormatDate(@DatePlanned, 'dd. MM. yyyy'), AS:FormatDate($nextWorkingDay, 'dd. MM. yyyy'), ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- shipping trailer weight exceeded - warning !--> <xsl:if test="string(@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId)"> <xsl:variable name="refLogisticsRouteScheduleId" select="@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId"/> <xsl:variable name="trailerId" select="AS:LookupValue('3ea462c7-b982-4595-9ed7-0bc2969cb956', @refLogisticsRouteScheduleId)"/>
<xsl:if test="string($trailerId)"> <xsl:variable name="maxLoad" select="AS:LookupValue('d05e6ecb-c741-41c6-a49a-b58f4116e9a1', $trailerId)"/> <xsl:variable name="currentApproxLoad" select="AS:LookupValue('6609d9c7-0be6-40b6-80e5-a014d9972345', 'DocumentDeliveryExtended_parLogisticsRouteScheduleId', @refLogisticsRouteScheduleId, 'DocumentDeliveryExtended_parDocumentId', @refDocumentId)"/> <xsl:variable name="thisDocumentLoad" select="AS:sum(/ROOT/Document/DocumentDelivery[@refLogisticsRouteScheduleId=$refLogisticsRouteScheduleId]/DocumentBillingDetail/@Weight)"/>
<!-- <test maxLoad="{$maxLoad}" currentApproxLoad="{$currentApproxLoad}" thisDocumentLoad="{$thisDocumentLoad}" totalLoad="{AS:iif(string($currentApproxLoad), $currentApproxLoad, 0) + $thisDocumentLoad}"/> !-->
<xsl:if test="(AS:iif(string($currentApproxLoad), $currentApproxLoad, 0) + $thisDocumentLoad) > $maxLoad"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'Weight'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_ShippingScheduleWeightByOrdersExceeded', AS:LookupValue('b6c439c9-de52-4fe1-82ea-53d1ab550da4', @refLogisticsRouteScheduleId))"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'Low'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <!-- weight exceeded !--> </xsl:if> <!-- trailer is known !--> </xsl:if> <!-- route schedule is known !--> </xsl:if> <!-- internal transportation is used !--> </xsl:if> <!-- transportation type is known !-->
<xsl:if test="( @refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_PartlyInvoiced') or @refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_FinalInvoice') or @refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_ProformaOnly') ) and ../@CheckABC = 'true' and AS:NumberOperand(@PriceForeignTotal, AS:sum(DocumentDeliveryActivity/@PriceForeign), 'MINUS') != 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'PriceForeign'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDeliveryActivity'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentActivityBreakdownNotCorrect', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- Manufacturing - only one primary manufactured product can exist in one delivery (multiple, if there are no secondary products in the same delivery --> <xsl:variable name="countPrimary" select="count(DocumentBillingDetail[ string(@refProductId) and AS:LookupValue('e74bd192-22a5-4861-b090-cc364e7f283e', @refProductId) = AS:GetConstant('ProductAcquisitionType_Manufacturing') ])"/>
<xsl:variable name="countSecondary" select="count(DocumentBillingDetail[ string(@refProductId) and string(@refManufacturingProcessId) and AS:LookupValue('e74bd192-22a5-4861-b090-cc364e7f283e', @refProductId) != AS:GetConstant('ProductAcquisitionType_Manufacturing') ])"/>
<xsl:if test="$countPrimary > 1 and $countSecondary > 1"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName" /> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DeliveryHasMultipleManufacturedProducts', ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentBillingDetail"> <xsl:with-param name="distributeAllProducts" select="$distributeAllProducts"/> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentBillingDetail"> <xsl:param name="distributeAllProducts"/>
<!-- inactive tax profile --> <xsl:if test="string(@refTaxProfileId) and AS:LookupValue('f35f6d69-2ed3-460e-bbf3-f6166fbfe0df', @refTaxProfileId) = 'false'"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refTaxProfileId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_InactiveTaxProfile_BillingDetail', AS:LookupValue('832582bc-10b5-4a4a-80de-5f117df81423', @refTaxProfileId), ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="string(@refProductId)"> <xsl:variable name="bestBeforeDays" select="AS:LookupValue('616af6ef-9848-4247-b040-25d41b325e37',@refProductId)" /> <xsl:if test="string(../@DateAgreed) and string($bestBeforeDays)"> <xsl:call-template name="ExpirationDateValidation"> <xsl:with-param name="referenceCode" select="../../@ReferenceCode"/> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="@InfoText1" /> <xsl:with-param name="overrideExpDate" select="@OverrideExpirationDate"/> <xsl:with-param name="agreedDelivery" select="../@DateAgreed" /> <xsl:with-param name="plneni" select="../@Text"/> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!--<xsl:if test="string(@OverrideExpirationDate) and AS:DifferenceInDays(@ExpirationDate, @OverrideExpirationDate) < 0 "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'OverrideExpirationDate'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_OverrideExprirationDAte_BillingDetail', AS:FormatDate(@OverrideExpirationDate, 'dd.MM.yyyy'), AS:FormatDate(@ExpirationDate, 'dd.MM.yyyy'), ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>-->
<xsl:if test="string(@refProductId) and $distributeAllProducts = 'false'"> <xsl:if test="not(string(AS:LookupValue('bb4170d1-b3f6-4632-b7c0-0980496d20b1', 'SiteProductDistributionCategory_parSiteId', ../../@refSiteId, 'Product_parId', @refProductId)))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refProductId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentBillingDetail_ProductInvalidSite', AS:LookupValue('4d477634-1044-49b5-91ee-f2d1c9ff4c30', @refProductId), AS:LookupValue('6224cbd1-54cb-4db7-a7b8-7d8b06be0d7e', ../../@refSiteId), ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<xsl:variable name="paymentAccountTypeId" select="AS:iif(../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract'), ../@refPaymentAccountTypeId, ../../@refPaymentAccountTypeId)"/>
<xsl:if test="@refPriceListBonusPointModeId = AS:GetConstant('PriceListBonusPointMode_Money') and $paymentAccountTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_BonusPoints')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refPriceListBonusPointModeId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_ProductCannotPayBonusPoints', @InfoText1, ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="@refPriceListBonusPointModeId = AS:GetConstant('PriceListBonusPointMode_Points') and $paymentAccountTypeId != AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountType_BonusPoints')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refPriceListBonusPointModeId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_ProductMustPayBonusPoints', @InfoText1, ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<!-- check zero quantity --> <xsl:if test="@Quantity = 0 and string(@refProductId) and ../../@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and ../../@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales') ">
<xsl:if test="AS:LookupValue('0a1d1fb8-7be6-4113-97d0-d0379d69f29f', @refProductId) = 'false'"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'Quantity'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentBillingDetail'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentQuantityZeroNotAllowed', AS:LookupValue('4d477634-1044-49b5-91ee-f2d1c9ff4c30', @refProductId), ../../@ReferenceCode, ../@Text )"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity">High</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template name="WorkingDays"> <xsl:param name="lookupId"/> <xsl:param name="calendarId"/> <xsl:param name="dayName"/>
<xsl:if test="AS:LookupValue($lookupId, $calendarId) = 'true'"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DatePlanned'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentInvalidShippingWeekDay', $dayName, ../@ReferenceCode, @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: Document_Dimensions
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<!-- include Dimensions_Lookup !--> <xsl:include href="model://ac0dc9ff-9fcc-4a9e-b810-d811d3c19699"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Document"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
<xsl:call-template name="SetDimensions"> <xsl:with-param name="entityId"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Document_PurchaseBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Document_SalesBill')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Document_PurchaseContract')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DimensionEntity_Document_SalesContract')"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="projectId"><xsl:value-of select="@refProjectId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="siteId"><xsl:value-of select="@refSiteId"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="businessPartnerId"><xsl:value-of select="@refBusinessPartnerId"/></xsl:with-param> <!-- <xsl:with-param name="warehouseId"></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="productId"></xsl:with-param> !--> </xsl:call-template>
<xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: ER_Document_CanFinish
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Document"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:if test="string(DocumentDelivery[@refDocumentDeliveryBillingTypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingType_None') and @refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_Invoiced') and @refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_Closed') ]/@Id)"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentNotFullyBilled', @ReferenceCode)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: ER_DocumentDelivery_CanCancel
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:for-each select="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:if test="@PriceLocalTotal_Bills != 0"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DeliveryBilledCannotCancel', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="@refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_BillingApproved')"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DeliveryBillingApprovedCannotCancel', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="not(AS:IsFeatureOn('COMMERCE_ALLOW_DELIVERED_ORDER_CANCELLATION'))"> <xsl:if test="sum(DocumentBillingDetail/@QuantityDelivered) != 0 "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DeliveryDeliveredCannotCancel', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:if>
<!-- check only the overhead of prepared to the delivered, so we don't count prepared if it has been delivered already --> <xsl:if test="sum(DocumentBillingDetail/@QuantityDeliveryPrepared) - sum(DocumentBillingDetail/@QuantityDelivered) > 0 "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDeliveryPreparedCannotCancel', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if>
<xsl:if test="sum(DocumentBillingDetail/@QuantityManufacturingPrepared) != 0 "> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"> <xsl:value-of select="'refDocumentDeliveryStateId'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"> <xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentManufacturingPreparedCannotCancel', AS:LookupValue('a39353e9-c7a0-4a9e-b6b6-38e352315d8e', @refDocumentId), @Text)"/> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"> <xsl:value-of select="'High'"/> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template name="Exception"> <xsl:param name="FieldName"/> <xsl:param name="EntityName"/> <xsl:param name="Message"/> <xsl:param name="Severity"/>
<RuleExceptionData> <FieldName> <xsl:value-of select="$FieldName"/> </FieldName> <EntityName> <xsl:value-of select="$EntityName"/> </EntityName> <Message> <xsl:value-of select="$Message"/> </Message> <Severity> <xsl:value-of select="$Severity"/> </Severity> </RuleExceptionData> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:include href="model://e1c65fcd-118d-4eb3-9c2f-aa27fec132ba"/>
<xsl:template match="/"> <RuleExceptionDataCollection xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <xsl:apply-templates select="row"/> </RuleExceptionDataCollection> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="row"> <xsl:variable name="documentTypeId" select="AS:LookupValue('b0dfadb4-8dbc-4979-8a8d-11d2f80ea626', @refDocumentId)"/>
<xsl:if test="$documentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and not(string(@refWarehouseId))"> <xsl:call-template name="Exception"> <xsl:with-param name="FieldName"><xsl:value-of select="'refWarehouseId'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="EntityName"><xsl:value-of select="'DocumentDelivery'"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Message"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetString('Commerce_DocumentDelivery_Bill_WarehouseMandatoryOnDelivery', @Text, AS:LookupValue('13f12478-a50f-4d1d-bbc4-b8cdd0464d54', @refDocumentId))"/></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="Severity"><xsl:value-of select="'High'"/></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
