SchemaItem.Name: OnPaymentCreated
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" exclude-result-prefixes="date AS">
<xsl:include href="model://19af0fa4-8e6d-42ec-8b55-e3b860b3d8df"/>
<xsl:template match="Payment"> <xsl:variable name="accountGeneralTypeId" select="AS:LookupValue('8fc3e879-8263-4bec-9073-03759bdd11ac', @refPaymentAccountId)"/>
<ROOT> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select = "@*"/>
<xsl:if test="@ReferenceCode = AS:GetConstant('_auto_string') and not(string(@refBankAccountStatementId))"> <xsl:variable name="ReferenceCode"> <xsl:call-template name="GetPaymentReferenceCode"> <xsl:with-param name="accountGeneralTypeId" select="$accountGeneralTypeId"/> <xsl:with-param name="paymentDirectionId" select="@refPaymentDirectionId"/> <xsl:with-param name="paymentAccountId" select="@refPaymentAccountId"/> <xsl:with-param name="date" select="@Date"/> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:attribute name="ReferenceCode"><xsl:value-of select="$ReferenceCode"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:copy-of select = "*"/> </xsl:copy> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: OnDocumentCreated
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" exclude-result-prefixes="date AS">
<xsl:include href="model://19af0fa4-8e6d-42ec-8b55-e3b860b3d8df"/>
<xsl:template match="Document"> <ROOT> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select = "@*"/> <xsl:variable name="counterDate"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_Proforma') and @refDocumentSubtypeId != AS:GetConstant('DocumentSubtype_Bill_ProformaCancellation')"> <xsl:value-of select="@DateVAT"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="@DateIssued"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="isPayment"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(@refPaymentAccountId) and @refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:iif(string(AS:LookupValue('767c92d7-b19f-45ea-ae2c-0dacc604cec4', @refPaymentAccountId)) and AS:LookupValue('532cb6fb-2912-4970-bc04-4d9799393359', @refPaymentAccountId) = 'false', 'true', 'false')"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>false</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="referenceCode"> <xsl:choose> <!-- reference code already assigned (not default) - we keep it --> <xsl:when test="@ReferenceCode != AS:GetConstant('_auto_string')"> <xsl:value-of select="@ReferenceCode"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$isPayment = 'true'"> <!-- cash payment, we assign a cash document code --> <xsl:call-template name="GetPaymentReferenceCode"> <xsl:with-param name="accountGeneralTypeId" select="AS:LookupValue('8fc3e879-8263-4bec-9073-03759bdd11ac', @refPaymentAccountId)"/> <xsl:with-param name="paymentDirectionId" select="AS:iif(@refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales'), AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Receipt'), AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Payment'))"/> <xsl:with-param name="paymentAccountId" select="@refPaymentAccountId"/> <xsl:with-param name="date" select="$counterDate"/> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when>
<!-- no payment, just an ordinary order or invoice --> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:variable name="PartnerLocationId" select="AS:LookupValue('4295c690-7948-4ada-968d-0dab9bd8aec1', @refBusinessPartnerId)"/>
<xsl:variable name="suffixDim1"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension1Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('fe6fdfe2-d914-46be-adac-a9e71b140e29', @refDimension1Id)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension1Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('6c3df3d7-dfbc-46b6-9df7-9769b2bff75c', @refDimension1Id)"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="suffixDim2"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension2Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('b06bdf8e-3f64-46b4-8f81-9a1afe9205f5', @refDimension2Id)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension2Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('1e628a58-7db6-49dc-8b09-04eed5d1669d', @refDimension2Id)"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="suffixDim3"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension3Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('79e2fa0c-01b3-4d93-9e8b-1a80fa9e7ccb', @refDimension3Id)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension3Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('9edb3782-078c-489b-9105-b72d6304105a', @refDimension3Id)"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="suffixDim4"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension4Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('038563a3-72bc-43cb-86c0-2615fb39fb63', @refDimension4Id)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(@refDimension4Id) and @refDocumentTypeId=AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Contract')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('e7c2c6c4-360a-4b91-9188-41be9dc49326', @refDimension4Id)"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="CounterCodeBase" select="concat( AS:LookupValue('9b45cf76-f5c5-4e70-b756-2ea77dade31f', @refDocumentDirectionId), AS:LookupValue('df05ab78-6987-4947-905a-90bcc28c762e', @refDocumentTypeId), AS:LookupValue('5a7ed2a8-cd39-4baf-8130-72f0ea305c5a', @refDocumentSubtypeId), $suffixDim1, $suffixDim2, $suffixDim3, $suffixDim4 )"/>
<xsl:variable name="CounterCode"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill')"> <xsl:value-of select="concat( $CounterCodeBase, AS:LookupValue('fbb07b3a-54eb-40df-b001-808f0b4c0209', $PartnerLocationId) )"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$CounterCodeBase"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:value-of select="AS:GenerateSerial($CounterCode, $counterDate)"/> </xsl:otherwise> <!-- document, no payment --> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:attribute name="ReferenceCode"><xsl:value-of select="$referenceCode"/></xsl:attribute>
<xsl:if test="not(string(@VariableSymbol))"> <xsl:attribute name="VariableSymbol"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"> <xsl:value-of select="$referenceCode"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@refDocumentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and @refDocumentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"> <xsl:value-of select="@PartnerReferenceCode"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:if>
<xsl:copy-of select = "*"/> </xsl:copy> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: CreateDefaultLogisticsRouteSchedule
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="Date"/> <xsl:param name="WarehouseId"/> <xsl:param name="BusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId"/> <xsl:param name="transportationTypeId"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:variable name="routeId" select="AS:LookupValue('87215ba2-8529-4e9a-b0cf-3d981608bec4', 'LogisticsRoute_parWarehouseId', $WarehouseId, 'LogisticsRouteUnloadingPoint_parBusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId', $BusinessPartnerCommunicationChannelId, 'LogisticsRoute_parDocumentTransportationTypeId', $transportationTypeId) "/>
<xsl:if test="string($routeId)"> <xsl:variable name="vehicleId" select="AS:LookupValue('4d6b96bb-623f-4163-9689-2ea4cd36bc7a', $routeId)"/>
<LogisticsRouteSchedule Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" DepartureTime="{substring-before($Date, 'T')}" refLogisticsRouteId="{$routeId}" refWarehouseId="{$WarehouseId}" refLogisticsRouteScheduleTypeId="{AS:LookupValue('aca5ccaa-cd08-408b-b565-350ed18ab874', $transportationTypeId)}" >
<xsl:if test="string($vehicleId)"> <xsl:attribute name="refLogisticsTrailerId"> <xsl:value-of select="$vehicleId"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="refDriverResourceId"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('4f394056-6468-46c7-9faf-af8f7b9d962a', $vehicleId)"/> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> </LogisticsRouteSchedule> </xsl:if> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: _getPaymentReferenceCode
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template name="GetPaymentReferenceCode"> <xsl:param name="accountGeneralTypeId"/> <xsl:param name="paymentDirectionId"/> <xsl:param name="paymentAccountId"/> <xsl:param name="date"/>
<xsl:variable name="counterCode"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$accountGeneralTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountGeneralType_Cash') and $paymentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Payment')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('9feef852-9c5f-40f0-a21d-9de43e6fb68f', $paymentAccountId)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$accountGeneralTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountGeneralType_Cash') and $paymentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Receipt')"> <xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('085dc626-85b0-4505-bf8b-f6f7840e0a64', $paymentAccountId)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$accountGeneralTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountGeneralType_BonusPoints') and $paymentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Payment')"> <xsl:value-of select="'Payment_BonusPoints_Payment'"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$accountGeneralTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAccountGeneralType_BonusPoints') and $paymentDirectionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Receipt')"> <xsl:value-of select="'Payment_BonusPoints_Receipt'"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:value-of select="AS:GenerateSerial($counterCode, $date)"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: OnDocumentDelivery_Delivered_SetBillingState
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentDelivery"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <!-- get business partner Id !--> <xsl:variable name="businessPartnerId" select="AS:LookupValue('870a5acb-5dda-4559-aebf-faac6a9e2e98', @refDocumentId)"/>
<!-- get delivery approval type !--> <xsl:variable name="approvalType" select="AS:isnull(AS:LookupValue('776dfcd0-7868-4f41-a6b4-897a5f3437f4', $businessPartnerId), AS:GetConstant('DefaultBillingApprovalType'))"/>
<xsl:if test="@refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_NotInvoiced')"> <xsl:if test="(@refDocumentDeliveryStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_WaitingForApproval') and $approvalType = AS:GetConstant('BillingApprovalType_OnDelivered') ) or ( @refDocumentDeliveryStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_Delivered') and ($approvalType = AS:GetConstant('BillingApprovalType_OnDelivered') or $approvalType = AS:GetConstant('BillingApprovalType_OnDeliveryApproved') ) ) "> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refDocumentDeliveryBillingStateId"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryBillingState_BillingApproved')"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: Project_SetState_Running
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="Project"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Project"> <xsl:if test="@refProjectDeliveryStateId = AS:GetConstant('ProjectDeliveryState_Planned')"> <Project> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refProjectDeliveryStateId"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('ProjectDeliveryState_Running')"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="refProjectStageId"><xsl:value-of select="AS:LookupValue('aaa569e9-d9ba-4fa4-9383-5972b73f718a', 'ProjectStage_parProjectDeliveryStateId', AS:GetConstant('ProjectDeliveryState_Running'), 'ProjectCategoryStage_parProjectCategoryId', @refProjectCategoryId)"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </Project> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: CreateBusinessPartnerCreditProfile_FromDefault
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="businessPartnerId"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="BusinessPartnerCreditProfileDefault"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="BusinessPartnerCreditProfileDefault"> <xsl:if test="not(string(AS:LookupValue('2592aae4-f1d8-41e1-867b-92da627929e6', 'BusinessPartnerCreditProfile_parCurrencyId', @refCurrencyId, 'BusinessPartnerCreditProfile_parBusinessPartnerId', $businessPartnerId)))"> <BusinessPartnerCreditProfile Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" CreditLimit="{@CreditLimit}" refBusinessPartnerCreditRatingId="{@refBusinessPartnerCreditRatingId}" refBusinessPartnerId="{$businessPartnerId}" refCurrencyId="{@refCurrencyId}" /> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: DocumentDelivery_SetAutoDeliveryState
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="directionId"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentDelivery"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:if test="string(@refWarehouseId) and @refDocumentDeliveryTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryType_DeliveryNote')"> <xsl:variable name="targetStateId"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="AS:LookupValue('1ae86318-ffd6-47cd-b23e-d767c85f18c4', @refWarehouseId) = 'true' and $directionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Purchase')"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_ReadyForReceiving')"/></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="AS:LookupValue('d1075ad0-8004-4d31-9c93-07f0d87bc5c5', @refWarehouseId) = 'true' and $directionId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentDirection_Sales')"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_ReadyForShipping')"/></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="@refDocumentDeliveryStateId"/></xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refDocumentDeliveryStateId"><xsl:value-of select="$targetStateId"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: BonusPayment
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="documentReferenceCode"/> <xsl:param name="bonusPoints"/> <xsl:param name="directionId"/> <xsl:param name="businessPartnerId"/> <xsl:param name="documentId"/> <xsl:param name="text"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <xsl:variable name="paymentText"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string($text)"> <xsl:value-of select="$text"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$directionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Receipt')"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(AS:GetString('Commerce_BonusPointInvoiceReceiptText'), ' ', $documentReferenceCode)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="concat(AS:GetString('Commerce_BonusPointOrderPaymentText'), ' ', $documentReferenceCode)"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable>
<ROOT> <Payment Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" Date="{substring-before(date:date-time(), 'T')}" PaymentDate="{substring-before(date:date-time(), 'T')}" DocumentPaymentCode="{$documentReferenceCode}" PriceForeign="{$bonusPoints}" PriceLocal="{$bonusPoints}" refBusinessPartnerId="{$businessPartnerId}" refCurrencyId="{AS:GetConstant('LocalCurrencyId')}" refPaymentAccountId="{AS:LookupValue('fc184895-e6a0-469a-a9ec-46a466fbe803', $businessPartnerId)}" refPaymentDirectionId="{$directionId}" > <Text><xsl:value-of select="$paymentText"/></Text>
<xsl:if test="string($documentId)"> <DocumentPayment Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" PriceForeign="{0}" PriceLocal="{0}" PriceReconciled="{0}" BonusPoints="{AS:iif($directionId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentDirection_Payment'), $bonusPoints, 0)}" refDocumentId="{$documentId}" /> </xsl:if> </Payment> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: BonusPayment_Cancel
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="Payment"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="Payment"> <xsl:variable name="id" select="AS:GenerateId()"/>
<xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
<xsl:attribute name="Id"><xsl:value-of select="$id"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="Date"><xsl:value-of select="substring-before(date:date-time(), 'T')"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PaymentDate"><xsl:value-of select="substring-before(date:date-time(), 'T')"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PriceForeign"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @PriceForeign"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PriceLocal"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @PriceLocal"/></xsl:attribute>
<xsl:copy-of select="*[name() != 'DocumentPayment' and name() != 'Text']"/>
<Text><xsl:value-of select="concat('Storno ', Text)"/></Text>
<xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentPayment"> <xsl:with-param name="paymentId" select="$id"/> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentPayment"> <xsl:param name="paymentId"/>
<xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
<xsl:attribute name="Id"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GenerateId()"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="refPaymentId"><xsl:value-of select="$paymentId"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PriceForeign"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @PriceForeign"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PriceLocal"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @PriceLocal"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="PriceReconciled"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @PriceReconciled"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="BonusPoints"><xsl:value-of select="0 - @BonusPoints"/></xsl:attribute>
<xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: AddBonusPoints_SD
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <SD Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" s1="{AS:GetString('Commerce_BonusPointManualPaymentText')}" /> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: OnDocumentCanceled
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="DocumentDelivery"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refDocumentDeliveryStateId"><xsl:value-of select="AS:GetConstant('DocumentDeliveryState_Canceled')"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: UpdateLogisticsRouteScheduleId_into_DocumentDelivery
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="LogisticsRouteScheduleId"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:apply-templates select="Document/DocumentDelivery"/> </ROOT> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="DocumentDelivery"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refLogisticsRouteScheduleId"><xsl:value-of select="$LogisticsRouteScheduleId"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: OnEnter_Document_OrderAccepted
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" exclude-result-prefixes="date AS">
<xsl:template match="Document"> <ROOT> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select = "@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="DateOrderAccepted"><xsl:value-of select="date:date-time()"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select = "*"/> </xsl:copy> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

SchemaItem.Name: CashPayment
SchemaItem.M01:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions" xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" exclude-result-prefixes="AS date">
<xsl:param name="documentReferenceCode"/> <xsl:param name="amount"/> <xsl:param name="directionId"/> <xsl:param name="paymentAccountTypeId"/> <xsl:param name="paymentAccountId"/> <xsl:param name="businessPartnerId"/> <xsl:param name="documentId"/> <xsl:param name="documentTypeId"/> <xsl:param name="documentBillStateId"/> <xsl:param name="text"/> <xsl:param name="date" select="substring-before(date:date-time(), 'T')"/>
<xsl:template match="ROOT"> <ROOT> <xsl:if test="$documentTypeId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentType_Bill') and string($paymentAccountId)"> <xsl:variable name="paymentAutomationTypeId" select="AS:LookupValue('767c92d7-b19f-45ea-ae2c-0dacc604cec4', $paymentAccountId)"/> <xsl:variable name="shareInvoiceNumber" select="AS:LookupValue('532cb6fb-2912-4970-bc04-4d9799393359', $paymentAccountId) = 'false'"/>
<xsl:if test="($documentBillStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentBillState_Created') and $paymentAutomationTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAutomationType_OnBillCreated')) or ($documentBillStateId = AS:GetConstant('DocumentBillState_Paid') and $paymentAutomationTypeId = AS:GetConstant('PaymentAutomationType_OnBillPaid')) "> <Payment Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" ReferenceCode="{AS:iif($shareInvoiceNumber = 'true', $documentReferenceCode, AS:GetConstant('_auto_string'))}" Date="{$date}" PaymentDate="{$date}" DocumentPaymentCode="{$documentReferenceCode}" PriceForeign="{$amount}" PriceLocal="0" refBusinessPartnerId="{$businessPartnerId}" refCurrencyId="{AS:GetConstant('LocalCurrencyId')}" refPaymentAccountId="{$paymentAccountId}" refPaymentDirectionId="{$directionId}" > <Text><xsl:value-of select="AS:iif($shareInvoiceNumber = 'true', $text, AS:GetString('Commerce_AutoPaymentText', $documentReferenceCode))"/></Text>
<DocumentPayment Id="{AS:GenerateId()}" PriceForeign="{$amount}" PriceLocal="0" PriceReconciled="{$amount}" BonusPoints="0" refDocumentId="{$documentId}" /> </Payment> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </ROOT> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
